Title: Following
Actors: Jeremy Theobald, Alex Haw, Lucy Russell, John Nolan
Plot: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

Title: Frank
Actors: Domhnall Gleeson, Moira Brooker, Paul Butterworth, Phil Kingston
Plot: Jon, a young wanna-be musician, discovers he's bitten off more than he can chew when he joins an eccentric pop band led by the mysterious and enigmatic Frank.

Title: Duel
Actors: Dennis Weaver, Jacqueline Scott, Eddie Firestone, Lou Frizzell
Plot: A business commuter is pursued and terrorized by a malevolent driver of a massive tractor-trailer.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 3 wins & 3 nominations.

Title: The Collector
Writer: Patrick Melton (screenplay), Marcus Dunstan (screenplay), Patrick Melton (earlier screenplay), Marcus Dunstan (earlier screenplay)
Actors: William Prael, Diane Ayala Goldner, Juan Fernández, Josh Stewart
Plot: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.

Title: Enemy
Actors: Jake Gyllenhaal, Mélanie Laurent, Sarah Gadon, Isabella Rossellini
Plot: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.

Title: WarGames
Actors: Matthew Broderick, Dabney Coleman, John Wood, Ally Sheedy
Plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 11 nominations.
